description: End-to-end test of URDF simulation integration. Spawn URDF in Gazebo, connect simulation plugins, and visualize in RViz.
expected_outcome: Gazebo successfully spawns the robot described in the URDF/XACRO file.
RViz shows the robot model correctly.
Joint states can be manipulated via joint_state_publisher (GUI or non-GUI).

files_to_edit.todo: Define the robot's base_link including visual, collision, and inertial properties

validation: Launch `display.launch` in a ROS workspace and check Gazebo spawns the robot.
Verify RViz shows the robot correctly.
Optionally manipulate joint states to confirm correct state publishing.
